segments.text: Mary , it's good to see you !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Josh and I were just on our way back home from the beach and thought we'd drop by .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am so glad that you decided to stop by !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it has been a long time since we have seen you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mary , can I get Josh or you something to drink ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh no , thank you . We aren't all that thirsty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about a little snack then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thank you , we just ate lunch a little while ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well then , how is your family ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everyone is doing great . My sister finally had her baby .
segments.speaker: S2
